location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.192 of 1851, from Lt-Col Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to His Excellency Lt-Col Justin Sheil, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: Letter including a completed form detailing British subjects present in Fars on 31 March 1851. Hennell notes that on this form (as opposed to previous returns) he has noted only British subjects of European (and not Asiatic) origin. Hennell also writes that he encloses a return from Commodore Porter of the Indian Naval Squadron, listing British subjects serving in the squadron in the Persian Gulf. The letter includes a table listing British subjects in the Province of Fars on 31 March 1851 (folio 6).
